pkgmetadata.longdescription: An L1-Version of the Spectral Clustering // Provides an l1-version of the spectral clustering algorithm devoted to robustly clustering highly perturbed graphs using l1-penalty. This algorithm is described with more details in the preprint C. Champion, M. Champion, M. Blazre, R. Burcelin and J.M. Loubes, "l1-spectral clustering algorithm: a robust spectral clustering using Lasso regularization" (2021).
